definitions.definition: Any of a class of organic compound , cyclic ethers , having a three-membered ring ; they are prepared by the selective oxidation of alkenes or by ring-closure of halohydrins ; used to make plastics .
Any similar compound in which an ether linkage has been made across a larger ring .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any of a class of organic compound , cyclic ethers , having a three-membered ring ; they are prepared by the selective oxidation of alkenes or by ring-closure of halohydrins ; used to make plastics .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry ) Any similar compound in which an ether linkage has been made across a larger ring .
